title: My dog love his new toy. The included treats were a great addition.
body: My dog is normally pretty finicky with his toys, either getting bored with them quickly or never playing with them at all. So far my dog has enjoyed this KONG Cozie as much as he does his Loofa Dog toy. Another good thing with this toy is that it appears very sturdy, my dog has a habit of ripping the ears and legs off of his toys and so far this one has stood up well.For the very low price here on Amazon I would definitely recommend this toy. My dog is 60 lbs and it's a fairly good size for him. The toy came with a couple treats in a sealed bag (that we just put in my dog's KONG rubber toy) so that's a definite plus!

title: Lose the long black hair
body: I liked it that the toy was fastened to the display board with a plastic tie instead of Swift Tacks (I am always worried about pieces staying in the toy and causing a choking hazard).  What I didn't like was the 14 inch black hair sewn into the seam of the toy that I assume is human.  I noted that the toy is manufactured in China and inspected in the U.S.  Well, I removed the hair and laundered the toy.  My dog is happy, but I will not purchase from Kong again.Super fast shipping from Amazon.

title: Great dog toy.
body: We have had this toy for a few months now. Our dog plays with it a lot. It's still fully intact, unlike other toys that we have bought recently. I would definitely recommend it.

title: Kong Dog Toys
body: Kong Dog Toys are well made and good value

title: Good toy for the price
body: Nice size, fair price (on Amazon at time of purchase), and our Australian Shepherd puppy likes it. I wouldn't pay what the pet stores here are asking ($11) though. It's definitely not worth that.

title: for kong it is destructible!
body: My 6 pound Chihuahua had ripped the back open with ease, pulled most of the stuffing out & the squeaker before I realized what happened.  The toy certainly isn't indestructible. It's too bad since it was a cute toy.  I had to sew it back together myself--minus the stuffing!

title: Great toy for my usually not-so-lovey pup
body: This little thing is my dogs favorite toy.  I don't know what it is about it, but he never tries to tear it up.  When he gets this one he almost lovingly chews on it, always careful not to be too rough.  It cracks me up to see him rampage around the house with his other toys and then gently pick this up, lay down, and lick and nip at it with one of his front paws draped over its body.  If I didn't think that this toy would last for quite some time I would definitely be buying another one.

title: and our dog loved it.
body: Cute, and our dog loved it...but within 10 minutes our 12-pound Maltipoo had the alligator's tail and one leg off.  I'm still searching for a longer-lasting dog toy!

title: Withstand the test of our dog!
body: Bought it for our medium sized dog that tears up all the doggie stuffed animals we get him in one day. After reading all the rave reviews, made the purchase and are LOVING IT!!! We've had it for a month now and the Cozie is still intact! WOW! Kong does it again! Love their products and will definitely keep buying from them.

title: good toy!
body: My dog loves it! She still is playing w/ it weeks later, and the squeeker still works! That is great news for my puppy...

title: and it's pretty durable so far
body: My pup loves it, and it's pretty durable so far!

title: My dog's best friend
body: Charlie (that's our dog) has a new best friend.  He loves this toy and enjoys sleeping right next to it.

title: Cute - Not Very Durable
body: I like to think that anything associated with Kong is going to withstand the play of big dogs, unfortunately, I can't find much that actually does. This lion was so cute and my dog loved it for about 5 hours!

title: Not so great
body: I had recently purchased the Kong DoDo bird toy and was expecting the same quality and toughness. That was definitely not the case. It didnt last more than 5 minutes. The dogs attacked with full force. Unlike the DoDo bird, it has a lot of stuffing and easily rips. Dont waste your money on this if you have a real chewer.

title: Defective doesn't squeak and too hard to squeeze.
body: Received defective toy. The squeaker doesn't squeak ... it is broken. Plus I have a hard time trying to squeeze the toy.  I normally play with the toys with my puppies and I couldn't even squeeze it because it was so stuffed and hard, regardless of the squeaker being broken.  Not a good toy for a small or medium size dog.I purchased another animal shape, same brand and maker, and it's squeaker was fine but again too hard to squeeze so I couldn't play with it with my puppies.  And neither of them would play with it because the squeaker is only a small one in the very end. They couldn't get it to squeak so they had no interest in it.

title: Very disappointed in this item
body: Item lasted for about 5 minutes until stuffing was already coming out.  Very disappointed in this item.

title: Great toy:)
body: My dog loves this toy but not made for serious chewers. My room mates dog had it tore in 2 days.

title: Weak construction
body: I ordered this and the purple rhino hoping that the "extra durable" material would provide some longevity. Instead my dogs (A dachshund and a rat terrier) tore through them both in less than an hour. Yes it says it isn't for chewers but this was ordinary play and squeaking. There is a great deal more filling in it than strength in the outer material. Unless your dog is like a child and must sleep with a toy, this toy is not for most dog owners.

title: Didn't last but one day
body: I ordered 4 Kong toys at the same time.  This one did not last one day and the stuffing, squeaker was pulled from it.  I would not buy another.

title: too cute
body: nice for a small dog.

title: Long lasting
body: My dogs tear all the stuffed animals they get apart, but these KONG animals last much longer than any other we've bought!  This is my second time purchasing these and I will do it again!

title: Our dog's night time snuggly. We have a Springer ...
body: Our dog's night time snuggly.  We have a Springer / Lab mix and this is her kennel / crate toy.  She loves it.  She has chewed the stuffing out of other cheap toys, but not this one (yet?)  We have had it about two months now and no sign of ripping.  She especially likes the squeaker in the butt of this toy.  It is a challenge for her to figure out where to bite to get the squeak!  So cute.  Washes up well too in the washer.

title: My puppy loves it...
body: but I was very dissapointed that the squeaker hasn't worked since the first day I got it.  Other than that, it is just an adorable toy!

title: Five Stars
body: My dog loves this

title: Five Stars
body: Gave this to the dog, and she didn't want to give it  back.  So I guess it works.

title: Five Stars
body: Great for larger dogs

title: Lasted two days
body: Well I was hoping that this cute little moose would stand his own against my puppy unfortunately, it did not. Within a few hours he already had the tail off and was destuffing it so in the trash it went.

title: Favorite toy!
body: My 11 pound Havanese loves it!  It's his favorite new toy out of the 3 I bought him for Christmas!  Plus, it's cheaper on amazon than at my local store!  Highly recommend!  It has the squeaker but it's also snuggly--my baby loves it!

title: Kong moose
body: This is one of my dog's favorite toys, she has the medium and the X-Large moose. She will carry both of them around the house constantly and they seem to be pretty durable. She tore a small hole in the medium one's leg, but she has had it for almost 3 years. This is really a great toy for the price, since the medium was only $5. I wish I could have found the X-Large online, as I had to go to Mounds and pay $20 for it, but it was worth it.

title: Not durable.
body: I shouldnt have let him have this toy til he was older. I thought it would have been more durable. Stuffing came out right away.  He is 9weeks old

title: Dane & his baby moose
body: On our second one because our Dane likes this little guy so much. First one tore at neck seam from two dogs using for tug-of-war, after 9 months or so.

title: It's of good quality seeing as his baby teeth haven't destroyed it ...
body: My German sheperd puppy loves this toy. It's of good quality seeing as his baby teeth haven't destroyed it yet. Also cute. It's small and almost fits in your hand.

title: It seems sturdy even with her chewing on it pretty hard
body: My puppy loves this toy. It seems sturdy even with her chewing on it pretty hard!

title: One Star
body: Fell apart first day within 20 minutes

title: Puppy Favorite
body: This is by far my 3 mo. old puppy's favorite toy.  He packs it around, chews and shakes it, and uses it as a pillow when he sleeps. It's his little buddy. It's been a month of puppy chewing and no signs of wear - holding up great.

title: Great For Puppies!
body: So far so good my 2 months and a half old siberean husky loves it

title: STRONG TOY
body: Best line of toys for dogs that really enjoy their toys.  Satchi, my new rescue loves all the Kong Cozie toys.  If you others lasted two seconds, these will last a lot longer.  I wash them three times a week as well and they do hold up.

title: We love this little guy
body: My puppy isn't a crazy chewer.  She spends most of her time chewing and has ruined a few toys, but she's just a cocker spaniel, she's not ferocious.  She likes to chew on this guy's ears and we play fetch with him (he's almost as big as her, so it is hilarious to see her drag him around).  We also 'wrestle' with him.  We've had him a few weeks and he's still in great shape.

title: worthless
body: I bought  two of these for our German shepherd and beagle for Christmas. After opening their presents we were disappointed to see the results. Both toys were apart with guts out and pieces off! In less than 45 minutes! Save your money!

title: Good toy
body: My dogs love it and hide it from each other, fun to watch. Since it was a Christmas toy it's always good to see presents well received.

title: Very sturdy, has held up well
body: Excellent quality toy. Our corgi loves it and sleeps with it in his crate each night.LisaFresh Eggs Dailywww.fresh-eggs-daily.com

title: It is filled with stuffing NOT kong rope/ material like the Kong Squirrel we bought at a local shop
body: This is NOT a chew toy. It is filled with stuffing NOT kong rope/ material like the Kong Squirrel we bought at a local shop. My bad for thinking we were saving by shopping KONG on Amazon instead of the huge markup of a small shop owner. Toy stuffing eviscerated in 30 minutes. So i suppose a babysitter is $10/hour. I broke even. Wont buy again.

title: Love seeing these around my house!
body: These things are durable and super cute. My dogs like to just squish them in their mouths rather than try to tear them apart. The squeaker is also not as annoying as some other toys.

title: Not as sturdy as I expected - ripped open in less than 3 hours
body: I bought this for my 6 month old puppy thinking it would be a great little friend for her and that she wouldnt be able to tear it up since it is a Kong toy.... WRONG. I gave it to her and we left to go to dinner and do some grocery shopping. When I got back 3 hours later she had already ripped a hole in his back and pulled out half of the stuffing. Good thing is she is used to getting her toys back once we have removed all of ths stuffing and the same was true with this. She likes tossing this one around just like all of her other toys but it is not the comfy cozie best friend I expected it to be.

title: NOT TOUGH!!
body: I thought this item was suppose to be durable and though, it wasn't.  It only lasted ONE HOUR!

title: Well Made
body: I have a 45 lb Staffy mix and she tears the squeaker out of every toy we get her within a day. She's had this for 3 months and the squeaker is still in tack and she still loves it. This is a great, inexpensive toy. Very happy I picked it up.

title: Completely gutted by dog in 9 minutes
body: He loves to play with the skeleton now but completely shredded it in no time. Not sturdy at all if you want a long lasting play toy for your dog.

title: Prefer the Lion to the Blue Dog
body: Very adorable blue dog, but unfortunately my Great Dane puppy had this ripped apart within 2 hours.  He's pretty dedicated to destroying everything, including my shoes if I accidentally leave them out.  He still has not been able to rip apart the lion from the same line that we purchased 6 months ago.  I'm not sure if the dog character is made differently, but he managed to get the belly apart rather easily.

title: xmas present
body: Very adorable- it's an xmas gift so I havent been able to assess the durability and love for it yet.

title: Five Stars
body: The purple haired lion is a big hit among my dog's toys!!!!

title: Four Stars
body: 4 WOOFS

title: Five Stars
body: Small is just the right size for my Shih Tzu.  It's still in one piece.

title: My 52 day old australlian sheperd loves Marvin and his ...
body: My 52 day old australlian sheperd loves Marvin and his squeaker. She carries him all around her puppy room. Though I do take it away when she begins to chew because I can see this thing getting destroyed with to much chewing.

title: My dog adores this toy
body: My jack russell cannot get enough of this toy. They'll tear it apart eventually (even though it's Kong it's still a plush), but it's still play-worthy even without its stuffing.

title: Kong Cozies are the best!
body: This is a replacement for my small dog's Rosie which has given her about a year of fun. She has worn out the squeaker (this one doesn't have the velcro opening  for replacing them that many Kong's have).  The fur is slobber-nasty, so time for a new one.

title: Toy was awesome just wish someone would make a toy that was ...
body: Toy was awesome just wish someone would make a toy that was virtually indestructible.  Took my puppy about 8mins to figure out how to rip the legs off.

title: Five Stars
body: The dog loves playing with this toy!  Seems to be quite durable.

title: love/hate
body: My dog loved this chew toy so much he destroyed it in less than one hour. A bit disappointing coming from KONG but expected of my border collie/mix. Not recommended for strong chewers!

title: Five Stars
body: this is a fun squeeker toy that my doggies love. def would buy it again.

title: Marvin the Moose Kong toy
body: Kong toys are the best. My puppy destoys every toy except the Kong ones. I will only buy Kong. This toy was pretty reasonably priced so I bought some for my kids' dogs too.

title: Do not gamble on the safety of this toy
body: Bought this knowing my Flatcoated Retriever would make short work of it.  Lasted less than one hour, and the squeaker(s) lasted a few minutes.  I was disappointed to find the stuffing appears to be a fiberglas type of material, some of which I found in the back yard after having passed through his digestive tract, as did a lump of green cover which I did not know he had swallowed.I am concerned lesser dogs may get their entire digestive system blocked with some of this toy.

title: not good for golden retrivers
body: bought this for my golden retriver it did not last more than two days she had the stuffing out of it the first day.

title: Elmer
body: .This is a fun toy for your dog. My dog just loves it and carries it all around. Buy one.

title: Didnt last as long as I had hoped.
body: i thought since it was made by kong that it would last longer under my dogs destruction

title: Didn't last
body: I bought 3 Kong Cozie Dog Toy for my three Dachshunds. The other two toys are well loved and played with after 2 months. Unfortunately, the alligator bit the dust shortly after hitting the ground.My oldest dachshund grabbed it, and a few minutes later, the stuffing was spread out all over the floor.The alligator's belly had split open and my three dogs had a great time playing with the stuffing.I highly recommend the moose or the blue dog Cozie, but not the alligator.

title: Dog toy
body: My dogs loved this toy.  Unfortunately they ripped all the stuffing out and made a gigantic mess.  If your dogs are ones to destroy toys this is not the toy for them.  Mine still play with the carcass though!

title: He absolutely loved it, when he got back to me he ...
body: I bought this for my foster puppy to take with him on a home visit. He absolutely loved it, when he got back to me he would take it to bed with him. This blue dog lasted a good month with him!!!!

title: Chew-resistant and right size for my olden retriever
body: My 2 year old golden retriever likes it. It is very cheese-resistant! I gave the toy to my dog together with a duckies toy, and the picture is what they are after a week

title: Big for your buck
body: Medium is way bigger than I expected. But I love it its adorable

title: Squeaker stopped when I was squeaking it to show my pet his new toy. He never even got to play with it. Don't buy bad squeaker.
body: Kong needs to checkout the supplier of there squeakers. We have other KONG squeaker toys they still work great and Ali the Alligator we got the same time is bad also. Bad KONG bad!!!

title: Four Stars
body: Great size for my York. Kong quality.

title: Vibrant Color
body: My Great Dane loves small stuffed animals. She carries them around the house and never tears them up. When she got this one Christmas morning she immediately took to it. It's a nice, vibrant green color. She's been carrying it around for days! Perfect for medium size dogs (even though mine is a Giant dog, she prefers the smaller toys!)

title: Great toys
body: My frenchie love this KONG toys, I ordered the moose, the monkey and the alligator and he loves to play or just to chew them. Every week they are machined washed. Very recommended.

title: Durable enough for a growing puppy!
body: I purchased this a few days before I picked up my lab puppy and was terrified after reading the reviews. Ever since he got home, this has been his favorite toy to chew and sleep with. A month and a half later, this toy is still in one piece! He is very rough with his toys (due to teething and puppy play) and this has stood up to his tough biting. I do have to admit, the alligator needed a little surgery, but there was just a small hole on the bottom. Nothing a little thread couldn't fix. I highly recommend purchasing this toy!

title: Dog had fun while it lasted
body: Lab loved it only lasted a week or two though

title: Medium Dog Toy
body: Semi-durable; post Christmas toy.  As stated in another review, nothing is chew proof but my little one and her friends enjoy the fun for a few days/weeks. For extended use, I always mend any damage and then it's back to toss, turn and romp. Little larger than expected but overall does the job.

title: Kong rocks again
body: My 4 month old puppy loves this, along with a few select toys.  This obne is so cute and she looks adorable with it hanging from her mouth.

title: We have always loved
body: Lasted a long time with my two dogs ripping it back and forth. It did eventually come apart but that's inevitable. We have always loved KONG

title: Five Stars
body: This is a good toy for small dogs.  The size is good and it is cute.

title: LOVE KONG PRODUCTS
body: I just gave feedback on the spunky money that the squeaker did not work from the start; however this was the first one I purchased and my puppy loves it.  She is very hard on toys and destroys all of them except this brand.  She has had this toy for a few months, it is her favorite and she loves the squeaker.  I will purchase more, but will check the squeaker now before I give it to her.

title: Kong Lion
body: I was excited to find a Kong stuffie.  The toy itself has held up extremely well however the squeaker died within 3 days of purchase.  My dogs play with their toys at bedtime so it wasn't a case of over use that "killed" the squeaker.  This toy is often left in the toy box because - hey, what fun is a stuffie that doesn't squeak?

title: My Puppies Bedtime Bear.
body: My Rottweiler puppy loves this toy, it is one of his favorites, but he has done some damage to it and he just turned 4 months so probably not good for a large dog once he is older.  The toy has no ears or tail and is missing one arm now, although I do like that each limb is sewed seperately so even though I had to get rid of the stuffing out of the arm he chewed apart-the rest of the stuffing is still inside all the rest of it for now.

title: tiny size
body: This is tiny. My bad for not paying attention to size. It's so small, it fits in my hand.

title: Cute toy but
body: I got this for my dog who loves to chew up things and it lasted a whole 2 mins! I only bought it cause it was a kong brand so thought it would last. Waste of money if your dog is a chewer

title: One of his favorites
body: This is one of my dogs favorite toys. It has held up quite nicely compared to other toys he has ripped apart.

title: Love the rhino!
body: My beagle loves this toy! She brings it all over the house with her. Three weeks and still going strong.

title: Five Stars
body: Dogs loved this.  Chewed it up.  Advice:  Don't give to Border Collie or Australian Shephard

title: Cute
body: Our Molly loves her blue dog.  She struts around with him when we get home and before we go to bed.

title: Not Interested
body: My Chow puppy is not interested in any of these.  The squeaker is in the fat part in the back and he can't get his mouth around it.  I am giving them to a friend for her dogs

title: good buy!
body: Our 9wk old pup loves this toy. He hasn't torn it apart yet... has had it for 2 wks...good buy!

title: KONG Cozie Rosie the Rhino...would not recommend
body: I rarely submit reviews but just had to...my 1-year old Pomeranian was able to tear the stuffing out in 3 days. I was under the impression "KONG" products were made to last longer than 3 days...enough said.

title: Spunky Monkey
body: It's cute but way smaller than we envisioned. Only get this for very small dogs - medium dogs will "laugh" at it! :)

title: If you want to keep it nice, only let your puppy play with this one, since an older dog playing with it and pup will destroy it.
body: my two dogs loved these to the short bitter end. If only one or two little pups, these are great. I have a Goldendoodle pup and a 10 year old beagle that has returned to puppyhood ~ between the two of them, especially the beagle, it did not last very long before the squeaker was removed by the dogs and destroyed. Great fun for a few days, otherwise.

title: KONG TOYS ARE GREAT PRODUCTS.  I WON'T BUY ANY OTHER KIND ANYMORE
body: My dog loves these KONG Cozie squeek toys.  He has all of them.  They are really durable...This new rescue dog really puts the beat on these animals and the squeekers are still working.  I wash them and dry them two times weekly and they have held up squeekers and all.  GREAT PRODUCTS.

title: My dog loves it!
body: My dog loves this toy but has holes in it and most of the stuffing is out of it.Could be of a sturdier material.

title: Great toy
body: My dogs love these toys and they hold up great. It took them a few weeks to get the stuffing out but I simply sewed it back together for another few weeks of fun. Great quality!!

title: One of the few toys my golden retriever service dog ...
body: One of the few toys my golden retriever service dog hasn't destroyed in 5 minutes. I think I'll only be purchasing KONG stuffed toys from now on - this one continues to last. Plus she loves it and tries to carry it with her everywhere!

title: not yet destroyed, very positive!
body: Our dog loves this dog. He is a Vizsla and was not yet able to take it apart, speaks for the quality of this toy.

title: Five Stars
body: My little doggies love this toy.

title: durable!
body: A month later and it hasn't been torn into. First item we've found for our old English bulldog and pit bull/mastiff mix that hasn't been destroyed.

title: Five Stars
body: Dog ate it in minutes - and the toy was bigger than he is...

title: strong!! my puppy loves it.
body: strong!!my puppy loves it.

title: Destuffed almost immediately
body: Didn't last much longer than his Moose counterpart. Destuffed by my big dog within a short period of time. Squeeker is no more!

title: Five Stars
body: Great item! Fast shipping!

title: Dogs like the Cozie, lasts surprisingly long time for stuffed toy
body: These have very little internal fluff so even when the dogs do get the stuffing out, you can just gut it and let the dogs play with the "skin" for weeks longer. They love these guys, and the embroidered eyes and nose make it safer for them to play with.

title: Five Stars
body: cute

title: One of my puppies favorite squeak toys
body: Very cute. One of my puppies favorite squeak toys.

title: Durable Little Guy
body: I bought this for our Lab who normally loves his little buddies to death, especially the squeakers inside.  So far everything has been great.  Our little lamb is still intact and he still squeaks - 2 really important qualities for a dog toy!

title: Dog loved toy to death!
body: Very cute and my dog loved it! Matter of fact, once he had completely destroyed it he played with the pieces. That is until I threw them away, which he was not happy about.

title: For the serious chewer it's not up to task
body: My brother's 50-lbs, lab/pit mix loved it.  He also had the stuffing out in about five minutes.  So it will bring your dog joy, but the joy is shortlived.  Alas, the hunt for a durable squeaky toy continues . . .

title: Cute, High-Quality Squeak Toy
body: this looks very durable, my twenty-some-pound shiba inu has had it for just a day so far but he seems to love it. it's a great size toy for him

title: Cute and soft with a squeaker. It's tough (made by Kong), but it's not a tug-of-war toy
body: This toy is really nice. It's got rope internally, but does still have stuffing. We got it for our puppy and don't let our bigger dog play with it because like most plush toys, it would be destroyed. Our puppy likes to play with it and doesn't really try to tear it up. I'm sure if he wanted to he could. He's not careful with it, but not destructive. The outside is fairly sturdy, but how tough do you expect soft plush material to be really? This is NOT a tug-of-war toy, even if it has roping inside it. Remember, you choose what is used for tug-of-war, not the dog.We've had ours 3 weeks, which isn't incredibly long, but it's holding together well.It does have a squeaker in it if you're worried about that.

title: Five Stars
body: Love the kong squeaky toys, more durable than the other stuffed dog toys.

title: Not for most dogs
body: Did not survive five minutes. Only for gentle dogs without the urge to rip it apart.

title: great toy
body: this is so cute and it is a great toy, medium size i have a 17lb doxie and she loves it!

title: Five Stars
body: My Eddie loves it

title: APBT approved
body: I have some heavy duty toy chewers and the KONG Cozies are their favorite and the last of the bunch to be destroyed

title: Five Stars
body: The best Kong toy we have purchased.  Seven months and still great shape and puppy loved.

title: Fun Dog Toy
body: I have 2 yorkies and a samoyed, so I was trying to find something for all my dogs.  The size is perfect for small and large dogs and they are durable for the small dogs.  Unfortunately, if you have a large dog, these still don't last very long.  My samoyed had it torn apart within a day.

title: Five Stars
body: My Dog's new favorite toy- she loves it!

title: Dog loved it... However
body: My 25 pound dog loves it. But it took about 1 hour for him to destroy it. The stuffing is no more, but the play time continues.

title: Five Stars
body: Perfect

title: Very amazing quality!
body: I purchased this item 3 months ago for my new puppy. My dog is a German Shepherd and now is going on 4 months old. This toy has been her favorite and is the most durable stuffed toy that I have ever seen. The squeaky part of it is not at all annoying (like I was afraid it was). What ever they used to build this toy is probably the best toy material I have ever seen. I want more bigger toys like this now that Sadie has grown lol)

title: Dog loves it!!
body: Bought this for my dog, he loves it! I read the reviews and decided to give it a try. He did eventually get all the stuffing out but he still carries it around like a friend.

title: Received Kiki's Seal of Approval!
body: Kiki's seal of approval although she like the pink elephant the best!Highly recommended toy for you special loved one who is always there for you.Come on go ahead and get her/him/it one. They will love you for it either way but it makes me feel good giving a gift to a "furry" person who deserves it.

title: not too sturdy
body: I thought most KONG products were durable.. there's nothing wrong the toy, but if you are expecting it to stand up to a dog who destroys most toys.. yea.. it's gonna have a short lifespan.

title: She didn't destroy it!!!
body: This is the first toy ever that my dog did not destroy on the first day.(except a rope toy) She has been playing with it for a month now and it is still intact. She loves to throw it in the air and catch it, lie down next to it. I had just about given up ever having my dog able to have a toy of her own. The toy is very cute and incredibly sturdy. I think I have one possible key to this success... she has not found the squeaker on any of the three Kong toys I have purchased. That's fine with me, as she does chew on it until she finds the noise. I have finally been able to find a toy my dog can enjoy from day to day.

title: Five Stars
body: Excellent quality

title: Adorable!
body: This toy is super cute, and better yet seems to be indestructable.  We have a 12 week old lab and she has not torn it to shreds yet.  The quality is really good, and I don't worry about the puppy eating it while i am out.

title: Great for gentler dogs!!
body: Super cute, dogs loved it...until they started ripping the ears off and I had to toss it.  For a gentle dog its great but if your Fido is rough on toys, you best not get this one.

title: Best Toy for Dogs Who Demolish Their Stuffed Toys
body: This holds up better than any other stuffed dog toy I have bought. My shiba inu loves stuffed toys but also loves to rip them apart and scatter the stuffing around the house within a few minutes. She has had it now for like three months and it is still perfectly in tact! Now I'm going to try some of the other Kong stuffed toys. Also a plus, it is like half the price here as what Petsmart has it for.

title: Durable Chew Toy
body: My dog goes through toys like a hot knife thru butter .... too fast!  No matter how durable the toy is supposed to be, my dog chews it apart in no time flat.  This Kong Cozie Alligator has withstood the rough chewing, tugging and attempts of destroying it's gone through.  I'm satisfied and so is my dog.

title: very satisfied, seller highly recommended
body: fast delivery, very satisfied, seller highly recommended, thank you!

title: KONG toys hold up!
body: VERY HAPPY with how the KONG toys last!  ALL of the Kong toys I've purchased are still on active duty in the trenches  with our two boisterous dogs!

title: Kong Elmer Elephant Dog Toy (Small)
body: This toy is cute and well made.  Unfortunately it was too big for my dog's small mouth.  He needs Extra Small.  I gave the toy, however, to my Granddog who loves it!We have had great success with Kong dog toys.  They last a long time, are washable, and rarely lose their squeak!  Just wish they made more in the Extra Small size.

title: my dachshund shreded it in 10 mins
body: I have to say that he seemed to have fun tearing it apart but I am not sure if was worth the money for such a brief amount of pleasure. I will have to ask the dog if he agrees.

title: Kong Toy
body: My dog skillet loves it. I think its a very good brand and I cant see myself buying any thing else

title: Lasted longer than expected.
body: Has lasted pretty long, it's missing it's appendages but surprising since my Golden Shepherd destroys everything.

title: Three Stars
body: Not too durable.  My dog destroyed it in 2 days

title: One Star
body: Not durable!

title: Moosie is marvelous!
body: So far, so great!  My puppy is happy as a, well, puppy with this one.  So many extremities to play with

title: I like it
body: Very cute and worth the money

title: Thought Kong was better made.
body: My dogs destroyed within an hour.  Thought Kong was better made.

title: Tough Little Toy
body: Our three English Bulldogs love this toy.  It's sturdy and takes chewing, biting, shaking and pulling pretty well.

title: pretty cute!
body: This toy is very well made. I haven't tested it out yet with my dog, because I am saving it for a rainy day. But my dog is not a huge toy destroyer, so he will have this one for a long time.

title: Better than most
body: This lasted longer than most toys for my black lab puppy but it eventually was chewed and destroyed.

title: Love these!
body: These arrived a couple days ago and they are a huge favorite with my dogs. I have to say, the pink elephant design is very adorable. The squeaker is deep enough that neither of my dogs has managed to pull it out of the toy, and other than some minor surface damage (this elephant is now tusk-less and has a few small holes in the ears) these are super sturdy. Will definitely be checking out the other animal shapes!

title: Five Stars
body: LOVES her toys.....worth the money

title: One Star
body: My maltese chewed it apart easily.

title: no squeaker left
body: The squeaker died in less than a week

title: Great
body: My dog loves his "Mr. Moose." He carries it around, throws it arpund and sleeps with it. Holding up well so far.

title: Still Going Strong
body: This guy has stood up to the test of our Golden so far. He typically rips up toys within a week or two and this one is still going strong. I think it's small enough that he doesn't try and throw it around in his mouth but KONG does seem to make lasting products. Would definitely recommend for your furry friend whether big or small.

title: Five Stars
body: Sturdy dog toy that my dog loves to play with!!

title: squeaker dies quickly, stiching is strong
body: The squeaker died after my puppy played with it for 2 days, such a bummer because the stitching is strong and the moose still looks like new after a month of play.

title: Two paws up!
body: My 5-month-old puppy loves this toy, it's withheld the test of teething and so far has lasted a full month. I've bought the same brand toys, just a different shape (Purple Rhino vs Brown Moose) in local retail stores and they can't hold up. Amazon has to have gotten a better shipment of toys!11/2/15 Update: Kayla's now a year and a half and she still loves her Kong toys. She has a plethora of them, they've all had "surgery" and some of them have lost a leg or two, but she loves them all the same.5/8/17 Update: This toy has held up the test of time. It's lasted for about two years now. We actually bought a second moose, she can distinguish the difference between the two and she still loves the original as much as the fat moose (that hasn't been mauled and has all his limbs.)

title: KONG toys are the best! Cute for pet parents and lots of fun ...
body: KONG toys are the best!  Cute for pet parents and lots of fun for the pups!  Great quality and last!

title: Mr Lion
body: Just have to say our dog is on his third day of playing with this. So far he has not destroyed it. Hopefully he's slowing down on destroying toys. He tosses it around & loves plaing with it.

title: Five Stars
body: Great quality, fast shipping!

title: Dogs love it. Held up better than a lot of ...
body: Dogs love it.  Held up better than a lot of other plushies, but don't expect it to stay in tact if you have a dog that destroys everything.

title: DESTROYED BY PUPPY
body: My 13-week-old PUPPY destroyed the toy in less than 15 minutes!!

title: My second Kong Alligator!
body: Many months ago, I brought in my first foster dog. A small 15lb beagle mix.  I bought her a bunch of toys.  She had no idea what to do with them.  Well, we have since adopted her and she has since learned to utterly destroy a stuffed animal in a mere minutes.  She can tear out stuffing and break squeakers like nobody's business!! Well, her "Gator" as well call it, has been her faithful buddy for eight months.  It's hers, and she's never destroyed it.  I think she remembers it being there with her in the crate when she spent her first night in a home (terrified), after leaving the shelter.  I don't know what happened recently, but she decided to rip out the stuffing!  The Gator remains though, in tact, with the exception of the hole that once kept Gator stuffed. I'm buying her a new one. She might destroy it, maybe she'll let it be a replacement, I don't know. Either way, Gator has a very special place in my heart and the heart of my Beagle.

title: Three Stars
body: lasted less than 24 hrs my little 10 terrier destroyed

title: Best Stuffed toy
body: My Golden Retriever puppy loves this moose.  This toy is very durable.  My puppy chews alot and has still not destroyed this toy.  This is one of his favorites.

title: Great toy!
body: My dog's favorite toy and durable too!  She rips through most soft toys immediately and this one has lasted for over a week!

title: Five Stars
body: perfect

title: Five Stars
body: love this one, fuzzy and holds up well

title: has lasted a couple of months and still good
body: my boxer mix is a real chewer and this has lasted much longer than other stuffed toys, good value, would get another

title: Well...
body: "Indestructible" is not a word I would use to describe this toy. My 14 pound dog had it ripped to shreds within a matter of hours. It is not a lifeless Moose with no squeaker and absent of stuffing. However, she still loves it and plays with it daily. This is our first Kong toy and it did not meet my expectations.

title: Love this!
body: Great little toy for little dogs

title: Tough toy
body: My dog likes to chew toys and pull their stuffing out.  Marvin withstands a fair amount of abuse before succumbing to her bad habit.  Marvin washes well in the washer and the squeakers last a long time.  I would recommend it.

title: A squeaking great time
body: She won't let him go!!

title: Four Stars
body: great squeaker toy

title: Five Stars
body: Instant Favorite.  will buy more

title: Stood up to shark teeth
body: My vizsla puppy needed something to chew on his 8-hour ride home from the breeder. I'm so glad I got two KONG Cozies for him - not only did they keep him occupied, the material has stood up to his razor-sharp shark teeth for the past 3 weeks and has no signs of wearing out soon. A must-have for the tough chewers.

title: My dog loves the pink elephant. I got her ...
body: My dog loves the pink elephant. I got her a large one when I first got her. Sadly, this lasted about a week.

title: Adorable
body: The dog just loves his new toy!  The alligator is sturdy, soft and worth the price as an add-on item.

title: Durable toy
body: I love these Kong toys. They hold up very well.

title: Four months of being loved to bits and still going
body: My Border Collie loves this toy and plays with it for hours. She isn't a chewer but plays pretty rough and the toy has stood up to everything she has given it. It washes well in the washing machine (gentle wash) and after four months it just now needs a slight repair behind the ear. I didn't expect it to last as well as it has and am delighted.

title: She is still going through a chewing stage and these toys have held up better than her others
body: My puppy loves these toys.  She immediately went for the tails and even though she chewed a piece off there was no stuffing for me to worry about.  The toys seem very tough and have a double layer.  My puppy is 10 months old and is an Australian Shepherd.  She is still going through a chewing stage and these toys have held up better than her others.

title: Cute
body: Cute dog toy.  It is sturdy and nice size for a small or medium dog.  I'd get my dog another one.

title: Not bad for the price
body: This was for my daughter's very destructive Rhodesian Ridgeback/pit bull mix. She usually shreds stuffed animals in five minutes, but this one actually took her a couple of days to destroy.

title: Great toy!!
body: I ordered this 2 days ago and got it today! Super fast shipping! And my dog (German Shepherd) loves it! The fabric is tougher than most stuffed dog toys, which is just what I needed for my dog!

title: They came out great.
body: My golden puppy loves these.  I even washed them in the sink with bleach and threw them in the dryer.  They came out great.

title: dog pulled stuffing out immediately
body: Within seconds my dog pulled the stuffing out. She keeps finding more too... I thought it would hold up a lot faster, I dont even consider her an aggressive chewer.

title: Five Stars
body: Our Pit bull loves them

title: Five Stars
body: It made my dog happy--thus  I am happy.

title: Fell apart in first 15 minutes of play
body: KONG's hard rubber chew toys are great - my dog loves them and they are very durable.  Their stuffed toys are a different story - this is the second KONG stuffed animal that we have bought and the second that fell apart after one play session.  I don't see a difference between KONG stuffed animals and the typical cheaper no-brand toys and plan on sticking to those in the future.  My dog (German Shepherd / Corgi mix) did very much enjoy playing with the toy though and we ended up keeping it for a while after it fell apart, thus the two star rating.

title: My dog can destroy a toy in minutes, this one has lasted
body: except for the tail and tag.  This is my second Kong stuffed animal and they hold up fairly well.  For the price offered by amazon, it can't be beat.  I normally by the cheaper stuffed toys at Petsmart for the same price and most of those don't make it through a weekend.

title: Great buy!
body: My dog loved this toy from the start! She would not let anyone near it for at least a day. I've had this toy for a couple weeks and its still in perfect condition, and keep in mind my hound dog is 60+ pounds and she loves to chew and tug. In fact, my dog loved this toy so much I bought two more

title: One Star
body: My 8 year old lab ripped the moose apart in 30 minutes!!

title: Five Stars
body: our dogs love this.....laste a couple of months.....our dogs detroy all their toys usually in days

title: Cute
body: This was a good product for our puppy. He sleeps with it and always carries it around. Great for small or medium dogs.

title: poor quality
body: Very disappointed in the quality of this toy. This toy was shredded within minutes. We purchased this after the Kong moose lasted our pup 2 weeks hoping for the same.

title:  Kong Cozie Littles!
body: Love these and my pets do too!

title: Love Kong Toys!
body: I was iffy on buying a dog toy online but you really can't go wrong with Kong toys. Perfect shape hasn't been tore up yet. Great quality Was shipped on time. Deffenitly recomend!

title: Last a long time
body: I bought my puppy this toy and to my surprise it lasted a long time.  Even though he chewed a horn and ear off it was still okay with no stuffing coming out.  I have tried other animals on the market and this one seems to hold up better then other brands.

title: KONG Cozie Marvin the Moose
body: My 70lb shepherd lab mix 1 year old puppy is a notorious toy killer.  We bought this guy right before his birthday on December 3rd, it's now the 19th and the toy is still in one piece only missing an antler so far.  This is the longest life any of his stuffed animal toys have had thus far!

title: Four Stars
body: dogs sleep with it.

title: Soft Fluff Built Tough
body: No stuffing to clean up!  This little pooch is well stitched as with all Kong products.  So soft and cuddly who wouldn't love it.

title: Didn't hold up as well as some other kong toys
body: It was super cute, but it didn't last very long with my puppy.  I was kind of surprised since it is made by kong.
